articles.title: Ed Sheeran called ‘magpie’ who ‘borrows’ ideas from other music stars during ‘Shape of You’ court battle - The Independent
articles.description: Judge compared songs after being told they sounded ‘almost identical’
articles.content:
Ed Sheeran has been branded a magpie who allegedly borrows ideas from other musicians during a trial over hit song Shape of You.
The singer-songwriter, 31, has been accused of stealing parts of anot… [+1011 chars]
